name: Tornado-arduino
tagline: Using web framework tornado with an arduino
body:
### Arduino on the web

You want to put your aduino on the web without the ethernet shield. This project is for you.
The goal is to demonstrate how use arduino with python and tornado.

### Installation

Clone the depot. Install virtualenv and follow this instruction. 

```
$ virtualenv init .venv
$ source .venv/bin/activate
$ pip install pyserial tornado
$ python serverled.py --serial /port/serial/arduino
```

The example code for arduino is in tornado/skeetchbook.

More documentation will come...
